name: Battlebeans: Arena
description:
An arena fps game for android (4.4+). I made this as an exercise and released it here so I can put it on my portfolio. Features:

-Singleplayer and LAN multiplayer (online matchmaking will be added once I have a server to run it on) for up to 8 players or bots.

-3 modes (deathmatch, team deathmatch and capture the flag), 6 maps and 6 unique weapons.

-Numerous options to customize your game, such as player health, armor, available weapons, movement speed, gravity and many more.

-AI players (bots) with four preset difficulty modes and a highly customizable "custom" difficulty

-Reasonably low requirements (but still not fully optimized) with adjustable graphics settings and controls
